description:
Kise is a stunningly famous guy who was among Kiseki no Sedai. he has a great ability in copying the movement styles of his opponent. He works as a model for magazines due to his height and good looking face. unlike his manly looks, he has a childish manner comparing to his friends in the same age.
Kise started basketball in the second year of middle school and is less experienced comparing to other players from Kiseki and claims to be the worst one among them. He shows high respect among Kuroko and feels sorry for him to be among the weak team of Teiko high.
He believes that Basketball is the game of Size, but with all these, he tries to convince Kuroko to join their team.
His Weak point is that he cant copy Kuroko`s game style and also is unable to do much when he cant see the movements of his opponent
name: Kise Ryouta
